mapper.select: SELECT o.*, a.receiver_name, a.receiver_phone, CONCAT(a.province, a.city, a.district, a.detail_address) as full_address FROM orders o LEFT JOIN addresses a ON o.address_id = a.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET wechat_order_no = #{wechatOrderNo}, wechat_prepay_id = #{wechatPrepayId}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE orders SET payment_status = #{paymentStatus}, payment_time = #{paymentTime}, wechat_order_no = #{wechatOrderNo}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
